title: [K-12] Advanced 2D Coordinate System Education Program Based on MEIoT (Micro-Electromechanical Internet of Things)

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematical concepts, IoT fundamentals, and mechatronics basics
context.additional_context: A remote collaborative learning environment utilizing IoT and mechatronics in a smartphone-centric limited-technology setting

learning_goals: Explain the concepts of axes, quadrants, and coordinate points in a 2D coordinate system within a virtual-physical environment by integrating IoT sensors
Complete over 80% of coordinate system-based spatial problem-solving projects using MEIoT tools
Successfully apply coordinate transformation algorithms at least three times while controlling mechatronics devices in a remote collaboration environment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
